FCS (Fish consumption survey) is co-implemented by the National Institute of Statistics (INETL), Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fishery (MAFF), and FAO. This survey is the second sub-round after its precedented sub-round 1, that was conducted during the dry-season. From the previous sub-round, it is found that the average percapita fish consumption was 8.4 kg per capita per year.
